_sText:
Extraxt all files to the Counterstrike Source maps folder.

================================================================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : de_battleship_hdr
FILENAME                : de_battleship_hdr.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 26 februari 2007 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map is set in a fortified mountain/desert town.
While this has nothing to do with Beirut, I used that title
because my popular cs map was also called cs_beirut, and both
maps have similar layout/game play.
(the orriginal map had nothing to do with beirut either but I had the
map idea after watching a movie with Chuck Norris who had to free hostages
in beirut :P )
 
NEW TEXTURES            : Most textures and skins
NEW MODELS		: Railing props, supports, turrets, antenna's, ...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : none
MAP VERSION		: build 63
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4, Softimage XSI and Paint Shop Pro 7
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : Core2duo Qx6700 2gb DDR2
 
compile time		: 9 hours (-final, -staticproplighting and -staticproppolys compile)
time spend on building 	: 1 month
			  1.1 update 1.5 years after initial release.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

Singleplay:

  Awakening (Half-Life 2) http://awakening.hl2files.com/
  Nickrock (Farcry)

Multiplay:

  cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
  de_kilo (Counter-strike)
  
  de_kilo2 (Counter-strike source)
  cs_beirut2 (Counter-strike source)
  cs_logistic_assault (Counter-strike source)

  ins_karkar (insurgency HL2 mod)
  ins_escort (insurgency HL2 mod)

  ctf_portalstorm (ctf HL2 mod)


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Extraxt all files to the Counterstrike Source maps folder.
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CocoNuT for the improved NAV file. (http://coconut.de.tc)
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.

================================================================================
* COPYRIGHT / PERMISSIONS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Redistributing is allowed

Bluestrike, Belgium.
